lead_paragraph: Letter writers are harsh about Mr. Trump’s choice. “Even for some Hoosier conservatives, his extremist views are too much to stomach,” one writes.

headline.print_headline: Winner of Trump’s V.P. Competition: Mike Pence
headline.main: The Winner of Donald Trump’s V.P. Competition: Mike Pence

snippet: Letter writers are harsh about Mr. Trump’s choice. “Even for some Hoosier conservatives, his extremist views are too much to stomach,” one writes....
